Class ec.vatimpl.StartVat 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.vatimpl.StartVat
public class StartVat
extends Object
This class merely embodies a main() for the "standard" way to start a vat running. See main(), below, for more details.

StartVat()

main(String[])
This main instantiates a StandardVat, and tells it to run its first argument, as a class loaded through the vat's default Class Loader (that is, itself!) with privelegedMain called on it.

StartVat 
 public StartVat()

main 
 public static void main(String args[])
This main instantiates a StandardVat, and tells it to run its first argument, as a class loaded through the vat's default Class Loader (that is, itself!) with privelegedMain called on it. The other arguments become arguments to the loaded class's main. It optionally takes "-watchdog" and "-seed" options to specify a watchdog timeout and random number generator seed, respectively.
